SuperCoopDescription: Houses 16 coop animals. Includes an extra incubator.
PremiumCoopDescription: Houses 20 coop animals. Adds an Auto-Petter.
PremiumBarnDescription: Houses 20 barn animals. Adds an Auto-Petter.
BigSiloDescription: Allows you to store twice as much hay for your animals.
DeluxeSiloDescription: You can store a ton of hay. Perfect for winter!
DeluxeShedDescription: Adds an extra room inside. The interior can be decorated.
PremiumShedDescription: Increases the size of the second room. The interior can be decorated.
